descriptionHTML:
Beautiful Color Stripe Live Wallpaper gives amazing color effects on your phone screen.

Every color has a meaning and a function. So just feel the magic of colors on your phone screen as this aesthetic, majestic and beautiful live wallpaper creates mesmerizing effects on the phone screen.

Choose from from different sets of colors that suits your choice and make you feel happy.

You also have a number of different animation sets to apply to make these colors look even more magical.

Try all the color combinations and animation styles and see for yourself how beautiful your phone looks. Let there be colors on the screen.

That's the beauty of color when seen in combination with other colors.
Color balance our chi, triggers emotions and memories, connect us to nature, inspire us, and can even seem to slow down time.

Colors that you reflect adds to the aura that you carry.

Color determines your mood.
Mood determines your productivity.
Productivity determines your success.
Success determines your happiness.
Success here means a measurement of satisfaction

We have put a lot of efforts in designing this decorative live wallpaper for you, and we believe you will definitely love this one.

Please download and share your view on Beautiful Material Live Wallpaper.

Our goal is to help users have an enjoyable experience when using our apps & games. It would be great if you download & use our app Beautiful Material Wallpaper and write a review based on your experience with it.
